hero.title: Trust us for quality, precision, and the best solutions.
hero.description: We are General Supplier, Fabrication, Machining, Mechanical, Electrical, and Civil Company

message.description: On behalf of the Board of Directors and management of PT Amanah Aulia Mandiri (PT AAM), we express renewed optimism in facing the global challenges of the construction industry. PT AAM is committed to continuous transformation in technology, products, and processes, with the goal of enhancing quality of life and the economy. Through solid team synergy, PT AAM remains focused on fostering collaboration between people, businesses, and strategies, and is ready to compete globally with world-class quality for a better future.

one.title: General Supplier
one.description: We provide services for supplying raw or semi-finished goods in accordance with contracts mutually agreed upon by both parties..

two.title: Construction
two.description: We offer services for designing, constructing, and renovating infrastructure, including building structures and civil engineering works, as agreed upon by both parties.

three.title: Civil
three.description: We provide fabrication services that include component manufacturing, structural assembly, and custom product work as needed.

four.title: Robotic
four.description: We provide mechanical services that include assembly, maintenance, and repair of industrial machinery and equipment.

five.title: Fabrication
five.description: We offer engineering services that include the design, development, and implementation of engineering solutions for various industries.

six.title: Mechanical
six.description: We provide electrical services that include installation, maintenance, and repair of electrical systems for various industrial sectors.

seven.title: Engineering
seven.description: We provide electrical services that include installation, maintenance, and repair of electrical systems for various industrial sectors.

eight.title: Electrical
eight.description: We provide electrical services that include installation, maintenance, and repair of electrical systems for various industrial sectors.

hero.title: Profile
hero.description: Discover Who We Are: Our Story, Vision, and Mission. Explore Our Organizational Structure, Legal Foundations, and Industry Certifications That Drive Our Commitment to Excellence.

message.subtitle: We are General Supplier, Fabrication, Machining, Mechanical, Electrical, Robotic and Civil company.
message.description-one: PT Amanah Aulia Mandiri has been operating since 2015, and throughout its journey, we have served a wide range of products, both on a large and small scale, as well as projects, tasks, workshops, and have predominantly covered the western Banten region and parts of Java, Sumatra, and Kalimantan.
message.description-two: PT Amanah Aulia Mandiri, as one of the General Suppliers and Project providers, is here to meet the needs of businesses focusing on Electrical Special Panel Maker, Mechanical, Engineering, Safety, and other projects. In 2019, we began venturing into the construction sector. We serve wholeheartedly and support customer needs, both large and small scale.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Meeting the needs of the industrial sector in manufacturing production machines, we also provide high-quality fabrication and repair services for parts. This helps reduce reliance on foreign products and supports the growth of domestic production capabilities.

mission.title: Missions
mission.description-one: Providing high-quality construction, fabrication, and engineering solutions that meet global standards and support sustainable development.
mission.description-two: Integrating advanced technologies, such as robotics and cybersecurity, to create safe, efficient, and intelligent infrastructure.
mission.description-three: Encouraging continuous innovation across all business lines to lead the digital transformation in the construction and technology sectors.
mission.description-four: Building strategic partnerships with stakeholders in various sectors to expand service reach and create added value for customers.
mission.description-five: Investing in human resource development to ensure competitive advantage in the dynamic global market.

organizational-structure.description: Get to know the passionate directors and managers behind our success.

hero.title: Legalities and Certifications
hero.description: Committed to high standards, our company holds all necessary legal compliances and certifications to guarantee the best service quality and safety in the industry.

hero.description: Delivering comprehensive services across fabrication, machining, mechanical, electrical, civil engineering, and robotic, backed by reliable supply solutions for every industry.

hero.title: Career
hero.description: Join us at and unlock your potential, working with a passionate team and making a real difference in the world. We eagerly look forward to your arrival!
